content.p: Welcome to the School of Politics and International Relations at University of Nottingham Malaysia! I'm Dr Benjamin Barton, the Head of School, and I'm thrilled you're here. In today's interconnected world, understanding global events and their impact can feel daunting. We are passionate about equipping students like you with the tools to navigate this complex landscape and make sense of it all. Whether you're an undergraduate, master's, or doctoral student, our programmes offer a comprehensive learning experience. We'll provide you with a strong academic foundation, guiding you through the essentials of political theory, research methods, data collection, and analysis. You'll explore fascinating area studies and delve into critical global themes, gaining real-world relevance and insights into the forces shaping our world. Our programmes also emphasise hands-on experience, allowing you to develop practical skills through policy paper drafting, engaging simulation games, and insightful field trips. Throughout your academic journey, you'll cultivate essential skills for success, including strong communication, collaboration, and critical thinking abilities â€“ skills that will serve you well beyond the classroom. We're excited to support you on your journey to understanding the world and your place in it.
